products.description: The Dual Lumen Stomach Tube is a specialized device designed for simultaneous gastric decompression and nutritional support. It features two distinct channels: one for draining stomach contents—reducing abdominal pressure and aspiration risk—and another for delivering enteral nutrition or medications. Typically inserted via the nose or mouth, this tube enhances patient comfort and improves clinical outcomes in critical care and postoperative settings.

products.description: Enteral Placement Kits are comprehensive tools for healthcare providers. They contain all necessary items like tubes, guides, and syringes to accurately place enteral feeding tubes, ensuring safe and efficient tube - feeding initiation.

The ENFit transition connector plays a pivotal role in enteral nutrition setups. This connector bridges the gap between legacy and ENFit - designed components, facilitating a smooth shift and safeguarding against potentially harmful misconnections during the change - over.

codes.description: No.: 01 · Description: Female ENFit® , Female Luer Lock Adapter, Purple

products.product_name: Funnel ENFit® Transition Connector With Cap
products.description: The enteral transition adapters are provided in a number of configurations providing different connection possibilities to enteral devices currently on the market. Adapters will facilitate compatibility between the new ENFit® system and the current existing system of devices as the market transitions to ENFit®.

codes.description: No.: 01 · Description: Enteral Transition adapters for enteral feeding

products.description: Ryles Tubes, also called nasogastric tubes, are flexible, hollow medical tools. Inserted via the nose into the stomach, they help with feeding, gastric decompression, and drug delivery for patients with diverse medical needs.

No.: 02 · Description: Transparent tube with radio-opaque stripe, without weighted tip

products.description: Ryles tubes are flexible, long - standing medical devices. Inserted through the nose into the stomach, they're used for multiple purposes, such as removing gastric contents, delivering nutrients, and administering medications.

products.description: A Nasointestinal Feeding Tube is a flexible medical device inserted through the nose and reaching the intestine. It's used to provide nutrition directly to the gut for patients who can't eat orally, ensuring proper nourishment.
